# Thaw (Spell)
## Overview
[[Transmutation Spells|Transmutation]] \[[[Earth Spells|earth]], [[Fire Spells|fire]]]

**Level:** [[2nd Level Druid Spells|Druid 2]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 3rd-Level Druid Spells List|Druid 3]]

**Casting Time:** 1 standard action

**Components:** V, S, DF

**Range:** Close (25 ft. + 5 ft./2 levels)

**Area:** 10-ft. cube/level

**Duration:** Instantaneous

**Saving Throw:** None

**Spell Resistance:** No

**Source:** Frostburn (WotC)­, pg. 105

All everfrost, slush, snow, mud, and ice in the spell’s area are filled with heat. Ice and snow become slush, slush becomes everfrost, and everfrost becomes bog (see page 88 of the *Dungeon Master’s Guide*, for information on bogs).
